properties.Name: Tasty Kalbi Restaurant
properties.description: This place has really good kalbi. Its also just opposite Starbucks, so you can easily get a coffee afterwards.

properties.Name: Jjajangmyong Restaurant
properties.description: This restaurant has great Jjajangmyong (black bean noodles) and Tangsuyuk (fried pork).

properties.Name: 24 Hour Kongnamul KukBap
properties.description: This restaurant serves really good Bean sprouts soup with rice! A cheap and healthy option :)

properties.Name: The Little King's Kimbap
properties.description: Cute little Kimbap restaurant with a simple selection of tasty Kimbab rolls :)

properties.Name: The Attic Pub
properties.description: "The Attic" (다락방) serves many Korean pub food favorites and has a 1980's style interior. Good food and good vibes.

properties.Name: Beer King Pub
properties.description: This franchise restaurant offers nice korean pub food. There is a good range of different menu items, and the taste is great. Fun fact: the owner of the restaurant used to run a cafe here, but ended up turning into a pub because it was more profitable!! This was probably the case because of the mass of uni students that pass by this spot every day.

properties.Name: Ttdokkpoki House
properties.description: A cute little restaurant serving popular snack Ttdokkpoki (rice cake puffs) with a spicy sauce.
